item.description:
Hi Everyone,

Another New Year's Eve is fast approaching, and it's time for us to celebrate the end of another decade! This party is an opportunity to bring the Integral, EnlightenNext, and Samadhi communities together to unleash our potential for an evolution in consciousness! Come celebrate with us, as we welcome Kenji Williams and Unfulfilled Desires to help get our coarse, subtle, and causal energies soaring!

Kenji Williams (http://www.kenjiwilli...) – “next wave multimedia artist” performing Bella Gaia (http://www.bellagaia....) – the new work he’s showing right now at the Copenhagen Climate talks. Kenji's a true visionary and well known in the integral circles... his music will stir your soul and get your feet moving.

Unfulfilled Desires (http://unfulfilleddes...) – burning into 2010 with their unique mix of jazz, funk, rock, and "I don't know what it is but I love it!" sound ... with UD's motto it's never enough till it's too much, you'll be dancing into the night!

And there'll be plenty of food and drinks for everyone. So join us for liftoff at Samadhi Integral this New Year’s Eve!

For info and reservations, go here: http://www.unfulfille....

Reserve now as space will be limited.

I look forward to seeing you there! Happy Holidays!

Love,
Ted
item.name: NYE Vertical Lift Off Party - 2010
